quote: A politics that is not sensitive to the concerns and circumstances of people's lives, a politics that does not speak to and include people, is an intellectually arrogant politics that deserves to fail.
author: Paul Wellstone

quote: All art is political in the sense that it serves someone's politics.
author: August Wilson

quote: I am a profound pessimist both about life and about human relations and about politics and ecology. Humans are inadequate and stupid creatures who sooner or later make a mess, and those who are trying to do good do a lot more damage than those who are muddling along.
author: A. S. Byatt

quote: Honestly, I'm interested in politics; I'm interested in giving back in some form, performing some sort of civic duty. But I'm not exploring a run for governor or senator or anything along those lines. I'm focused on running Disney.
author: Bob Iger

quote: I never have been involved in politics.
author: Rick Warren

quote: In politics, readily dismissing inconvenient people can easily extend to dismissing inconvenient truths about them.
author: Daniel Goleman

quote: I've been offered political shows before, and I don't know anything about politics and I feel uncomfortable making political opinions - there's consequences to them. I often think I'm wrong, so I really don't like getting in political or religious discussions because of the giant possibility that I might be wrong.
author: Norm MacDonald

quote: My passion for ideas is not matched with a passion for partisan or electoral politics.
author: Jack Kemp

quote: China's stock market is inextricably tied to politics.
author: Kenneth Fisher

quote: Everything is politics.
author: Thomas Mann

quote: In most places in the country, voting is looked upon as a right and a duty, but in Chicago it's a sport.
author: Dick Gregory

quote: He too serves a certain purpose who only stands and cheers.
author: Henry Adams

quote: Politics, as a practise, whatever its professions, has always been the systematic organization of hatreds.
author: Henry Adams

quote: Politics... have always been the systematic organization of hatreds.
author: Henry Adams

quote: I learnt more about politics during one South Dakota dust storm than in seven years at the university.
author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quote: I deliberately did not read anything about the Vietnam War because I felt the politics of the war eclipsed what happened to the veterans. The politics were irrelevant to what this memorial was.
author: Maya Lin

quote: Growing up in politics I know that women decide all elections because we do all the work.
author: Caroline Kennedy

quote: Many politicians are in the habit of laying it down as a self-evident proposition that no people ought to be free till they are fit to use their freedom. The maxim is worthy of the fool in the old story who resolved not to go into the water till he had learned to swim.
author: Thomas Babington Macaulay

quote: Of course there are regrets. I shall regret always that I found my own authentic voice in politics. I was too conservative, too conventional. Too safe, too often. Too defensive. Too reactive. Later, too often on the back foot.
author: John Major

quote: I am sure future historians will say the biggest and most astonishing change in politics has been the embracing of all the tenets of Thatcherism by the party of Keir Hardie: trade union legislation, Europe, the replacement of Trident, 10 per cent tax for people who have made millions from their companies.
author: Robert Harris

quote: Don't get married until you're certain that you're marrying the right girl. How did I know my wife was the one? I'd seen her for a couple of months. I liked her. She was a very creative person and she had a very good grip on politics and business.
author: Brian Wilson

quote: It's true that it's within the realm of cultural politics that young people tend to work through political issues, which I think is good, although it's not going to solve the problems.
author: Angela Davis

quote: The arts community is generally dominated by liberals because if you are concerned mainly with painting or sculpture, you don't have time to study how the world works. And if you have no understanding of economics, strategy, history and politics, then naturally you would be a liberal.
author: Mark Helprin

quote: First lady has been a thankless position. Eleanor Roosevelt was brilliant and had strong views. She was criticized for her politics and for her appearance. Mrs. Roosevelt was attacked for being too involved in politics. Bess Truman was criticized for being uninvolved in politics.
author: Karen DeCrow

quote: When I came into politics I always thought there was a possibility I would be killed.
author: Imran Khan

quote: Justice, sir, is the great interest of man on earth. It is the ligament which holds civilized beings and civilized nations together.
author: Daniel Webster

quote: I want to stay away from politics, or else I'll probably end up putting my size fifteen foot into my mouth.
author: Peter Steele

quote: I would prefer not to be involved in party politics.
author: George Soros

quote: Unfortunately the global warming hysteria, as I see it, is driven by politics more than by science.
author: Freeman Dyson

quote: 'The Means' is about power. I have access to political insiders who helped me write a portrait of the real day-to-day in politics, which turned out to be crazier than Wall Street.
author: Douglas Brunt

quote: Politics is a game and a profession. It doesn't really serve the people the politicians are supposed to serve.
author: Kit Harington

quote: When they see me holding fish, they can see that I am comfortable with kings as well as with paupers.
author: Imelda Marcos

quote: Few businessmen are capable of being in politics, they don't understand the democratic process, they have neither the tolerance or the depth it takes. Democracy isn't a business.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: Though politics is by nature divisive, surely we all can agree that foster children need stability, safety, education, opportunity - and love.
author: Vanessa Diffenbaugh

quote: Politics ruins the character.
author: Otto von Bismarck

quote: Well you know it's dangerous in politics, because especially in the Philippines there's a lot of killing in politics.
author: Manny Pacquiao

quote: Electoral politics was always an objective of the Black Panther party, so Barack Obama is a part of what we dreamed and struggled and died for.
author: Bobby Seale

quote: The military destabilised my government on politically motivated charges.
author: Benazir Bhutto

quote: For every talent that poverty has stimulated it has blighted a hundred.
author: John W. Gardner

quote: The world is governed by opinion.
author: William Ellery Channing

quote: Politics, where fat, bald, disagreeable men, unable to be candidates themselves, teach a president how to act on a public stage.
author: Jimmy Breslin

quote: The only politics in this country that's relevant to black people today is the politics of revolution... none other.
author: H. Rap Brown

quote: Businessmen should not put their finger in politics, because they tend to think only of their own self-interest. But I worry about the low morale in Italian industry and the lack of government initiatives to help the poor.
author: Diego Della Valle

quote: I'm a longtime believer in the old adage that sunlight is the best disinfectant, particularly in politics.
author: Mike Quigley

quote: Turn on to politics, or politics will turn on you.
author: Ralph Nader

quote: The argument of the broken window pane is the most valuable argument in modern politics.
author: Emmeline Pankhurst

quote: Their very conservatism is secondhand, and they don't know what they are conserving.
author: Robertson Davies

quote: Fortunately, we Argentines have decided to change. We believe politics needs to be led by public servants with a vocation to give and construct.
author: Mauricio Macri

quote: As politics is disconnected from its ethical and material moorings, it becomes easier to punish and imprison young people than to educate them.
author: Henry Giroux

quote: We are naive and moralistic women. We are human beings who find politics a blight upon the human condition. And do not know how one copes with it except through politics.
author: Kate Millett

quote: I was supposed to be women's lib, and now I'd exceeded it and gone over into international politics.
author: Kate Millett

quote: So you can say whatever you want and quote me however you want about politics and make the next payday, and that's fine because I'm making that deal with you, but just mention the movie along the way, OK?
author: James Woods

quote: There was a widespread indignation in the American media. They were saying, 'How can you make a movie during an election that's about politics? What are you doing? Are you trying to influence people's lives?' To which my response was, 'Well, I hope so.'
author: John Sayles

quote: In Washington, DC, politics dominate even the most casual conversations.
author: Armstrong Williams

quote: It's called political economy because it is has nothing to do with either politics or economy.
author: Stephen Leacock

quote: I like Ronald Reagan, who didn't play crass politics, and he just articulated and delivered on broad themes that were needed. Free markets meant free markets. Deregulation. Lower tax rates. Strong national defense. And he was credible and believable.
author: Dave Brat

quote: The problem with modern politics is everybody is doing sound bite stuff. In my stump speech, I give 20 minutes on why I think we're off track. And I think people do really want to engage in a serious high-level discussion on how to get the country back on track because people care about their own country.
author: Dave Brat

quote: Party honesty is party expediency.
author: Grover Cleveland

quote: Your every voter, as surely as your chief magistrate, exercises a public trust.
author: Grover Cleveland

quote: This is not the time for partisan bickering. This is not the time for politics as usual. Some of us are Democrats. Some of us are Republicans. Some of us are Independents. Above all, we must be Oklahomans first.
author: Brad Henry

quote: In politics, the people I most despise are those who have no values.
author: Diane Abbott

quote: But what I'm very interested in, whether it's writing, whether it's hosting a show, whether it's cooking food, I'm just into the discussions of identity, culture and the politics of culture.
author: Eddie Huang

quote: I hate it when politics play too large part in the sport.
author: Jacques Villeneuve

quote: The public seldom forgive twice.
author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quote: What politicians want to create is irreversible change because when you leave office someone changes it back again.
author: Estelle Morris

quote: Politics is not a game for naive thinkers. You may go in as an idealist, but you certainly won't come out as one.
author: Honeysuckle Weeks

quote: One's politics are part of one even when one is writing. But if I want to say anything about the state of civil society, I will write an essay. The responsibilities you feel as a novelist are literary ones, I think, not civic ones. And I think politicians are interesting to write about.
author: Thomas Mallon

quote: I have no child to inherit my properties. You, the people, are my only family, and to make you happy is the reason I do politics.
author: Park Geun-hye

quote: Remain close to government and away from politics. It means deal more with the authorities. And less with individuals.
author: Wang Jianlin

quote: In politics, madame, you need two things: friends, but above all an enemy.
author: Brian Mulroney

quote: Beware the politically obsessed. They are often bright and interesting, but they have something missing in their natures; there is a hole, an empty place, and they use politics to fill it up. It leaves them somehow misshapen.
author: Peggy Noonan

quote: To an intellectual who is adrift in politics, a theory is an aim; to a true politician his theory is a boundary.
author: Francis Parker Yockey

quote: In a world where global politics is no longer a zero-sum game, it is - or should be - counterintuitive to pursue one's interests without considering the interests of others.
author: Hassan Rouhani

quote: I can't let important policy decisions hinge on the fact that an election is coming up every 90 days.
author: Gerhard Schroder

quote: Although he's regularly asked to do so, God does not take sides in American politics.
author: George J. Mitchell

quote: Even with politics, stuff comes around again. Woody Guthrie would recognize America today.
author: Billy Bragg

quote: From where many of us in the U.K. sit, American politics is hopelessly polarized. All kinds of issues get bundled up into two great heaps. The rest of the world, today and across the centuries, simply doesn't see things in this horribly oversimplified way.
author: N. T. Wright

quote: Freedom of the press is guaranteed only to those who own one.
author: A. J. Liebling

quote: The Vice-Presidency is sort of like the last cookie on the plate. Everybody insists he won't take it, but somebody always does.
author: Bill Vaughan

quote: I was a woman in a man's world. I was a Democrat in a Republican administration. I was an intellectual in a world of bureaucrats. I talked differently. This may have made me a bit like an ink blot.
author: Jeane Kirkpatrick

quote: The Tea Party represents stakeholders in the American system; people who were never involved in politics or thought they had to be, yet realized that political corruption and incompetence threatened not only their families, but the future of the nation itself.
author: Tammy Bruce

quote: I hope that in my books there's an undertone of politics, basic tenets of how we should live.
author: Jasper Fforde

quote: I know my limitations, and I don't like politics. I was only involved because of my husband.
author: Corazon Aquino

quote: Macroeconomic policy can never be devoid of politics: it involves fundamental trade-offs and affects different groups differently.
author: Joseph Stiglitz

quote: Politics is compromise.
author: Paddy Ashdown

quote: Satire is fascinating stuff. It's deadly serious, and when politics begin to break down, there is a drift towards satire, because it's the only thing that makes any sense.
author: Ben Nicholson

quote: You better take advantage of the good cigars. You don't get much else in that job.
author: Thomas P. O'Neill

quote: And after I make a lot of money, I'll be able to afford running for office.
author: Christy Romano

quote: My life experiences have helped me to be less fearful. In politics, that has allowed me to take on issues sooner rather than later.
author: Jackie Speier

quote: A conservative is one who admires radicals centuries after they're dead.
author: Leo Rosten

quote: We're seeing quite a lot of people who really would like a return to class-based politics.
author: Patricia Hewitt

quote: In politics, guts is all.
author: Barbara Castle

quote: It is very creditable when a woman gets into politics. She does this at the expense of responsibilities toward her home and family and should be lauded for this.
author: Preneet Kaur

quote: It is money, money, money! Not ideas, not principles, but money that reigns supreme in American politics.
author: Robert Byrd

quote: I think sometimes women are not driven by the same, albeit, testosterone power thing that pushes men to get into politics.
author: Morgan Fairchild

quote: You cannot spend your way out of recession or borrow your way out of debt.
author: Daniel Hannan

quote: People don't get involved with local charities or politics because they think it's hard to make a difference and the problem feels overwhelming. But I believe that if all I've time for this year is to write one letter to the local council, it's still worth doing.
author: Monica Ali

quote: My father was a businessman, but my mother was an intellectual. She cared about culture, politics, and philosophy, so I became interested in the protest aspect of Latin American art.
author: Jorge M. Perez

quote: In politics people give you what they think you deserve and deny you what they think you want.
author: C. Northcote Parkinson

quote: People want change but not too much change. Finding that balance is tricky for every politician.
author: Eleanor Clift

quote: If there is a ground zero in the cultural wars, it is Missouri, a state where pro-life groups are strong and well organized and their agenda dominates local politics.
author: Eleanor Clift

quote: Economics, politics, and personalities are often inseparable.
author: Charles Edison

quote: You know they say the most dangerous person of the world is a member of the United States Congress just home from a three-day fact-finding trip.
author: Johnny Isakson

quote: Frankly, I don't mind not being President. I just mind that someone else is.
author: Edward Kennedy

quote: A politician is a person with whose politics you don't agree if you agree with him he's a statesman.
author: David Lloyd George

quote: Be your own politics, grow your own garden, and maybe you can help out more.
author: Rip Torn

quote: It is our experience that political leaders do not always mean the opposite of what they say.
author: Abba Eban

quote: Half a century ago, Ronald Reagan, the man whose relentless optimism inspired me to enter politics, famously said that he didn't leave the Democratic Party; the party left him. I can certainly relate. I didn't leave the Republican Party; it left me.
author: Charlie Crist

quote: In politics the choice is constantly between two evils.
author: John Morley

quote: Our party is a diverse one, as is my home state of Illinois.
author: Dick Durbin

quote: If American politics are too dirty for women to take part in, there's something wrong with American politics.
author: Edna Ferber

quote: I have an aim - I have a clear aim in my mind, and the aim is that I do not like what I see in Indian politics; it is something that is inside my heart.
author: Rahul Gandhi

quote: I was looking for a new challenge and got an interest in trying to make a difference for families. You become more aware of how important families are. They are the key institution in our culture. The reason I got into politics was to try to make a difference for that key institution, whether it was tax policy, education policy, or whatever.
author: Jim Jordan

quote: Confronted with the choice, the American people would choose the policeman's truncheon over the anarchist's bomb.
author: Spiro T. Agnew

quote: I always voted at my party's call, and I never thought of thinking for myself at all.
author: William Gilbert

quote: Before I had decided to get into politics, I was laying the groundwork to have a career in the law, but that was really to lay the foundation to teach, either at the college level or law school level after my federal clerkships.
author: Stephanie Herseth

quote: A purely objective viewpoint does not exist in the cosmos or in politics.
author: Howard Fineman

quote: Social history might be defined negatively as the history of a people with the politics left out.
author: G. M. Trevelyan

quote: After much prayerful consideration, I feel that I must say I have climbed my last political mountain.
author: George C. Wallace

quote: I've always loved history, from my youngest memories. My father enjoyed the great stories of history, like Hereward the Wake, Robin Hood, and Richard the Lionheart, and he shared them with me. I went on to do a degree in history, though I found it rather dry, because it was mostly about politics rather than dashing individuals!
author: Jo Beverley

quote: The Israelis are very smart about politics and strategy, but there are a few exceptions. One is Lebanon, the other is Gaza, where they were completely inept.
author: Daniel Pipes

quote: There's an old rule of thumb in politics that 90 percent of all 90 year-olds vote and 25 percent of all 25 year-olds vote.
author: Joseph P. Kennedy III

quote: We have to ask ourselves why younger women don't feel the need to be right up front with their politics. Is that going to set us back or is that itself a sign of progress? I don't know the answer.
author: Ann Powers

quote: Let's clean up the Senate and return to politics of common ground.
author: Mark Pryor

quote: I know politics and politicians are hated, but I still believe in goodness of a heart that has selfless intentions. With the grace of God, I will make a difference.
author: Rajyavardhan Singh Rathore

quote: It's a no-win situation with politics it's always going to be stressful. I'm more into the comedy of life.
author: Jordan Peele

quote: There seem to me to be very few facts, at least ascertainable facts, in politics.
author: Robert Peel

quote: My friend told me later he got the chicken pox. I told him I caught politics and never got over it.
author: Jack Johnson

quote: I can remember when Democrats believed that it was the duty of America to fight for freedom over tyranny.
author: Zell Miller

quote: A healthy democracy requires a decent society; it requires that we are honorable, generous, tolerant and respectful.
author: Charles W. Pickering

quote: One thing I have learned in my time in politics is that if one of the parties is shameless, the other party cannot afford to be spineless.
author: Frank Lautenberg

quote: Four years in the White House and two presidential campaigns is an awful long time. In politics, every year in the White House is like dog years, six years off your life.
author: George Stephanopoulos

quote: Politics disappears it vanishes. What remains constant is human life. So I try to develop a perspective in my writing where politics is just one of the pieces of furniture in this furnished world. It is not the purpose. It is not the goal.
author: Tatyana Tolstaya

quote: The essential ingredient of politics is timing.
author: Pierre Trudeau

quote: What is politics but persuading the public to vote for this and support that and endure these for the promise of those?
author: Gilbert Highet

quote: I'd like to be for cinema what Shakespeare was for theatre, Marx for politics and Freud for psychology: someone after whom nothing is as it used to be.
author: Rainer Werner Fassbinder

quote: I can't afford to be indifferent to politics, but I don't have personal ambitions.
author: Vagit Alekperov

quote: I wasn't a particularly brilliant student, but on the other hand, I was very active in Student Union affairs and in student politics.
author: Cesar Milstein

quote: I have a temperament that doesn't adapt well to politics. It's because I speak my mind so much.
author: Joaquim Barbosa

quote: I have way too shady a background to get into politics. I was a crazy kid - I was in bands, and I don't think I'd get very far before people started digging up stuff I didn't want them to see.
author: Michael Joseph Kelly

quote: Television is democracy at its ugliest.
author: Paddy Chayefsky

quote: We in the Middle East like to talk politics, we like to argue. Just look at the three prophets - Moses, Jesus and Mohammad. They are all from this small region which creates problems all the time.
author: Hamad bin Khalifa Al Thani

quote: The great disadvantage of our present electoral system is that it freezes the pattern of politics, and holds together the incompatible because everyone assumes that if a party splits it will be electorally slaughtered.
author: Roy Jenkins

quote: Reiterating the belief that HIV is the cause of AIDS is an easy thing to do. Understanding the science and politics of the situation is much more complicated and requires study with a critical and open mind.
author: Nate Mendel

quote: Korea can't become a 'first-class' nation unless regulation and 'a sense of power' disappear. The nation's politics is the fourth-class, bureaucratic are the third-class, and business is the second-class.
author: Lee Kun-hee

quote: My character and my behavior is not for politics. I say what I think. I'm too liberal.
author: Naguib Sawiris

quote: There is a type of snobbish, pompous journalist who thinks that the only news that has any validity is war, famine, pestilence or politics. I don't come from that school.
author: Piers Morgan

quote: If a politician murders his mother, the first response of the press or of his opponents will likely be not that it was a terrible thing to do, but rather that in a statement made six years before he had gone on record as being opposed to matricide.
author: Meg Greenfield

quote: I think Syria is in a particularly sensitive geopolitical position in terms of the politics of the Middle East.
author: Edward Luck

quote: There are no true friends in politics. We are all sharks circling, and waiting, for traces of blood to appear in the water.
author: Alan Clark

quote: So begins a question which has of late become more and more urgent: what is the relation of aesthetics to politics?
author: Mark Poster

quote: Some of the FDA's own scientists have charged that politics, not science, is behind the FDA's actions.
author: Joseph Crowley

quote: I'm a wise Latina woman. Whatever, man. Thank God I'm not in politics, because the fact that you have to explain everything - I'd kill myself. I can't take all those little things they dissect. I'm like, 'Oh my God, get a life.' I don't have time for this.
author: Justina Machado

quote: I never let politics get personal. You can have the most intense, heated debate on issues, and so long as you keep it on issues, you can go out and have coffee afterwards and you're good friends.
author: Phil Crane

quote: It was through the private world of family that the public world of politics came alive for me: living in intimate proximity with people for whom larger questions of ideology and belief, as well as issues relating to politics and governance, were vivid daily realities.
author: Sonia Gandhi

quote: A politician will do anything to keep his job - even become a patriot.
author: William Randolph

quote: I had no intention of entering politics, but then the force of events led me to become involved in politics.
author: Sergio Mattarella

quote: Talk politics, talk about study and talk positively.
author: Jiang Zemin

quote: Politics is the science of who gets what, when, and why.
author: Sidney Hillman

quote: A liberal is a man who is willing to spend somebody else's money.
author: Carter Glass

quote: In politics it is necessary to take nothing tragically and everything seriously.
author: Louis Adolphe Thiers

quote: Crime does not pay as well as politics.
author: Alfred Newman

quote: The gun is not out of Irish politics.
author: Ian Paisley

quote: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.
author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quote: One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Share your smile with the world. It's a symbol of friendship and peace.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
author: Helen Keller

quote: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: Remember that the most valuable antiques are dear old friends.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: The strong bond of friendship is not always a balanced equation; friendship is not always about giving and taking in equal shares. Instead, friendship is grounded in a feeling that you know exactly who will be there for you when you need something, no matter what or when.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: I cannot even imagine where I would be today were it not for that handful of friends who have given me a heart full of joy. Let's face it, friends make life a lot more fun.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: A single rose can be my garden... a single friend, my world.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: True friends stab you in the front.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Don't walk behind me I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy, they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: Friendship is the shadow of the evening, which increases with the setting sun of life.
author: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: There are no strangers here Only friends you haven't yet met.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: If you have one true friend you have more than your share.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: The language of friendship is not words but meanings.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: A true friend is someone who is there for you when he'd rather be anywhere else.
author: Len Wein

quote: Friendship... is not something you learn in school. But if you haven't learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learned anything.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Depth of friendship does not depend on length of acquaintance.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.
author: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: I have a loyalty that runs in my bloodstream, when I lock into someone or something, you can't get me away from it because I commit that thoroughly. That's in friendship, that's a deal, that's a commitment. Don't give me paper - I can get the same lawyer who drew it up to break it. But if you shake my hand, that's for life.
author: Jerry Lewis

quote: A true friend freely, advises justly, assists readily, adventures boldly, takes all patiently, defends courageously, and continues a friend unchangeably.
author: William Penn

quote: Love is flower like Friendship is like a sheltering tree.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: Each friend represents a world in us, a world not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born.
author: Anais Nin

quote: Of all possessions a friend is the most precious.
author: Herodotus

quote: Love is blind friendship closes its eyes.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Friendship is one mind in two bodies.
author: Mencius

quote: As iron sharpens iron, so a friend sharpens a friend.
author: King Solomon

quote: When I was growing up, my mother was always a friend to my siblings and me (in addition to being all the other things a mom is), and I was always grateful for that because I knew she was someone I could talk to and joke with, and argue with and that nothing would ever harm that friendship.
author: Marlo Thomas

quote: I have learned that to be with those I like is enough.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: The friend who can be silent with us in a moment of despair or confusion, who can stay with us in an hour of grief and bereavement, who can tolerate not knowing... not healing, not curing... that is a friend who cares.
author: Henri Nouwen

quote: A true friend is the greatest of all blessings, and that which we take the least care of all to acquire.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Friends are born, not made.
author: Henry Adams

quote: My friends are my estate.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: The bird a nest, the spider a web, man friendship.
author: William Blake

quote: There is a magnet in your heart that will attract true friends. That magnet is unselfishness, thinking of others first; when you learn to live for others, they will live for you.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: Never explain - your friends do not need it and your enemies will not believe you anyway.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Sweet is the memory of distant friends! Like the mellow rays of the departing sun, it falls tenderly, yet sadly, on the heart.
author: Washington Irving

quote: A friend is, as it were, a second self.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: True friendship ought never to conceal what it thinks.
author: St. Jerome

quote: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: True friendship is a plant of slow growth, and must undergo and withstand the shocks of adversity, before it is entitled to the appellation.
author: George Washington

quote: When we honestly ask ourselves which person in our lives means the most to us, we often find that it is those who, instead of giving advice, solutions, or cures, have chosen rather to share our pain and touch our wounds with a warm and tender hand.
author: Henri Nouwen

quote: But friendship is precious, not only in the shade, but in the sunshine of life, and thanks to a benevolent arrangement the greater part of life is sunshine.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: The most I can do for my friend is simply be his friend.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: A quarrel between friends, when made up, adds a new tie to friendship.
author: Saint Francis de Sales

quote: Of all the things which wisdom provides to make us entirely happy, much the greatest is the possession of friendship.
author: Epicurus

quote: A woman may very well form a friendship with a man, but for this to endure, it must be assisted by a little physical antipathy.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Your friend is your needs answered.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: But friendship is the breathing rose, with sweets in every fold.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: False friendship, like the ivy, decays and ruins the walls it embraces; but true friendship gives new life and animation to the object it supports.
author: Richard Burton

quote: Real friendship, like real poetry, is extremely rare - and precious as a pearl.
author: Tahar Ben Jelloun

quote: What sweetness is left in life, if you take away friendship? Robbing life of friendship is like robbing the world of the sun. A true friend is more to be esteemed than kinsfolk.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: The love that comes from friendship is the underlying facet of a happy life.
author: Chelsea Handler

quote: The friendship that can cease has never been real.
author: St. Jerome

quote: Friendship is a sheltering tree.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: There is something in the unselfish and self-sacrificing love of a brute, which goes directly to the heart of him who has had frequent occasion to test the paltry friendship and gossamer fidelity of mere Man.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: The lust and attraction are often a given in a romance novel - I want to dig into the elements of true friendship that form a foundation for a solid, gonna-last-forever romantic relationship.
author: Suzanne Brockmann

quote: Life has no blessing like a prudent friend.
author: Euripides

quote: Friendship is essentially a partnership.
author: Aristotle

quote: Here's a news flash: No soldier gives his life. That's not the way it works. Most soldiers who make a conscious decision to place themselves in harm's way do it to protect their buddies. They do it because of the bonds of friendship - and it goes so much deeper than friendship.
author: Eric Massa

quote: I don't need a friend who changes when I change and who nods when I nod my shadow does that much better.
author: Plutarch

quote: A gang is the same as a wolf pack; gang members do not use their energies in friendship with one another, for they do not know what friendship is. If they are united, it is by the common bond of a desire to attack their world.
author: Haniel Long

quote: Every friendship goes through ups and downs. Dysfunctional patterns set in external situations cause internal friction you grow apart and then bounce back together.
author: Mariella Frostrup

quote: Remember that a gesture of friendship, no matter how small, is always appreciated.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Opposition is true friendship.
author: William Blake

quote: The feeling of friendship is like that of being comfortably filled with roast beef; love, like being enlivened with champagne.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Some people are willing to betray years of friendship just to get a little bit of the spotlight.
author: Lauren Conrad

quote: Friendship is also about liking a person for their failings, their weakness. It's also about mutual help, not about exploitation.
author: Paul Theroux

quote: Friendship has always belonged to the core of my spiritual journey.
author: Henri Nouwen

quote: A lot of times, in our culture and our society, we put romantic love somehow on a higher plane than self-love and friendship love. You can't do that. You have to honor and really fully invest in all these different loving relationships.
author: Delilah

quote: It's the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter.
author: Marlene Dietrich

quote: On the relationship side, if you teach people to respond actively and constructively when someone they care about has a victory, it increases love and friendship and decreases the probability of depression.
author: Martin Seligman

quote: Every friendship is different because everyone's personality is different.
author: Nargis Fakhri

quote: Never do a wrong thing to make a friend or to keep one.
author: Robert E. Lee

quote: Be courteous to all, but intimate with few, and let those few be well tried before you give them your confidence.
author: George Washington

quote: All you need to do to be my friend is like me.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: Friendship is a plant of slow growth and must undergo and withstand the shocks of adversity before it is entitled to the appellation.
author: George Washington

quote: Fan the sinking flame of hilarity with the wing of friendship and pass the rosy wine.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: I had three chairs in my house; one for solitude, two for friendship, three for society.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: One of the surest evidences of friendship that one individual can display to another is telling him gently of a fault. If any other can excel it, it is listening to such a disclosure with gratitude, and amending the error.
author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: The differences between friends cannot but reinforce their friendship.
author: Mao Zedong

quote: General benevolence, but not general friendship, made a man what he ought to be.
author: Jane Austen

quote: Peace and friendship with all mankind is our wisest policy, and I wish we may be permitted to pursue it.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: To embrace the whole world in friendship is wisdom. This wisdom is not changeable like the flowers that bloom and fade.
author: Thiruvalluvar

quote: Eros will have naked bodies Friendship naked personalities.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: Some people go to priests others to poetry I to my friends.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: I don't know if I've ever been in a clique. The older I've gotten, the more I've realized what a true friend really is. So my friendship circle has changed a bit.
author: Aimee Teegarden

quote: People come in and out of our lives, and the true test of friendship is whether you can pick back up right where you left off the last time you saw each other.
author: Lisa See

quote: No matter what message you are about to deliver somewhere, whether it is holding out a hand of friendship, or making clear that you disapprove of something, is the fact that the person sitting across the table is a human being, so the goal is to always establish common ground.
author: Madeleine Albright

quote: Have you ever thought how humiliating and distressing it was to be placed upon a sphere? For friendship it is a boon never to be able to be further apart than the antipodes. But suppose that you are leaving together to go on and on it is impossible. To go beyond a certain point is to return to where you began.
author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: Never contract friendship with a man that is not better than thyself.
author: Confucius

quote: Let there be no purpose in friendship save the deepening of the spirit.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: An excellent man he has no enemies and none of his friends like him.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Friendship and money: oil and water.
author: Mario Puzo

quote: A friend should be one in whose understanding and virtue we can equally confide, and whose opinion we can value at once for its justness and its sincerity.
author: Robert Hall

quote: The essence of true friendship is to make allowance for another's little lapses.
author: David Storey

quote: Great is the victory, but the friendship of all is greater.
author: Emil Zatopek

quote: Friendship, like the immortality of the soul, is too good to be believed.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: When the world is so complicated, the simple gift of friendship is within all of our hands.
author: Maria Shriver

quote: Friendship often ends in love, but love in friendship - never.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Friendship with a man is friendship with his virtue.
author: Mencius

quote: Everybody understands friendship, and friendship is different than love - it's a different kind of love. Friendship has more freedom, more latitude. You don't expect your friend to be as you think your friend should be; you expect your friend just to love you as a friend.
author: Carole King

quote: A traitor is a betrayer - one who practices injury, while professing friendship. Benedict Arnold was a traitor, solely because, while professing friendship for the American cause, he attempted to injure it. An open enemy, however criminal in other respects, is no traitor.
author: Lysander Spooner

quote: I take friendship very seriously.
author: Wole Soyinka

quote: Pak-China friendship is higher than Himalayas, deeper than ocean, sweeter than honey, and stronger than steel.
author: Shehbaz Sharif

quote: The dupe of friendship, and the fool of love; have I not reason to hate and to despise myself? Indeed I do; and chiefly for not having hated and despised the world enough.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: Friends confront each other sometimes, and sometimes the friendship lasts, and sometimes it doesn't.
author: Brooke Elliott

quote: The joys of friendship inert the heart and fizzy home bouncing jubilantly with laughter-buttered love.
author: Bradley Chicho

quote: One friend in a lifetime is much, two are many, three are hardly possible. Friendship needs a certain parallelism of life, a community of thought, a rivalry of aim.
author: Henry Adams

quote: Shows like 'Sex and the City' got women involved again in a political way. They were drawn into the personal stories of the four women who together make up one complete cosmopolitan woman. We want to have community, and the show filled that void in our lives: friendship between women.
author: Kim Cattrall

quote: Love is rarer than genius itself. And friendship is rarer than love.
author: Charles Peguy

quote: The ideal friendship is to feel as one while remaining two.
author: Sophie Swetchine

quote: Few things tend more to alienate friendship than a want of punctuality in our engagements. I have known the breach of a promise to dine or sup to break up more than one intimacy.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: I do think, in time, people will have, sort of, relationships with certain kinds of robots - not every robot, but certain kinds of robots - where they might feel that it is a sort of friendship, but it's going to be of a robot-human kind.
author: Cynthia Breazeal

quote: We must reach out our hand in friendship and dignity both to those who would befriend us and those who would be our enemy.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Friendship, like love, is destroyed by long absence, though it may be increased by short intermissions.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: I'm loyal, and I like my friends. Friendship enriches your life and makes it more interesting.
author: Wendi Deng Murdoch

quote: Acquaintances we meet, enjoy, and can easily leave behind; but friendship grows deep roots.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: He who hath many friends hath none.
author: Aristotle

quote: Never have a companion that casts you in the shade.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: You find out who your real friends are when you're involved in a scandal.
author: Elizabeth Taylor

quote: It is not so much our friends' help that helps us, as the confidence of their help.
author: Epicurus

quote: A man cannot be said to succeed in this life who does not satisfy one friend.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: How delightful to find a friend in everyone.
author: Joseph Brodsky

quote: We call that person who has lost his father, an orphan; and a widower that man who has lost his wife. But that man who has known the immense unhappiness of losing a friend, by what name do we call him? Here every language is silent and holds its peace in impotence.
author: Joseph Roux

quote: Nothing but heaven itself is better than a friend who is really a friend.
author: Plautus

quote: I want my friend to miss me as long as I miss him.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Mighty proud I am that I am able to have a spare bed for my friends.
author: Samuel Pepys

quote: To avoid being mistaken for a sellout, I chose my friends carefully. The more politically active black students. The foreign students. The Chicanos. The Marxist professors and structural feminists and punk-rock performance poets.
author: Barack Obama

quote: Friendship will not stand the strain of very much good advice for very long.
author: Robert Staughton Lynd

quote: If it's very painful for you to criticize your friends - you're safe in doing it. But if you take the slightest pleasure in it, that's the time to hold your tongue.
author: Alice Miller

quote: Friendship often ends in love but love in friendship – never.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: The greatest sweetener of human life is Friendship. To raise this to the highest pitch of enjoyment, is a secret which but few discover.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: If a man does not make new acquaintances as he advances through life, he will soon find himself left alone. A man, sir, should keep his friendship in a constant repair.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Our way is straight and clear - the building up of a socialist democracy at home, with freedom and prosperity for all, and the maintenance of world peace and friendship with all nations abroad.
author: Lal Bahadur Shastri

quote: Friendship is but another name for an alliance with the follies and the misfortunes of others. Our own share of miseries is sufficient: why enter then as volunteers into those of another?
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: I love life in spite of all that mars it. I love friendship, jokes and laughter.
author: Tahar Ben Jelloun

quote: Friendship is the complete explanation of what a Cheetah Girl is - if you have that true friendship, you can conquer anything you want.
author: Sabrina Bryan

quote: Friendship is like money, easier made than kept.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: If we would build on a sure foundation in friendship, we must love friends for their sake rather than for our own.
author: Charlotte Bronte

quote: Don't flatter yourselves that friendship authorizes you to say disagreeable things to your intimates. On the contrary, the nearer you come into relation with a person, the more necessary do tact and courtesy become.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: Secrecy is the chastity of friendship.
author: Jeremy Taylor

quote: The sacrifices of friendship were beautiful in her eyes as long as she was not asked to make them.
author: Hector Hugh Munro

quote: Friendship is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Plautus

quote: Friendship with ones self is all important, because without it one cannot be friends with anyone else in the world.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: It is difficult to obtain the friendship of a cat. It is a philosophical animal... one that does not place its affections thoughtlessly.
author: Theophile Gautier

quote: Friendship is a very taxing and arduous form of leisure activity.
author: Mortimer Adler

quote: Pity and friendship are two passions incompatible with each other.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: Friendship always benefits love sometimes injures.
author: Seneca

quote: The beginning of a friendship, the fact that two people out of the thousands around them can meet and connect and become friends, seems like a kind of magic to me. But maintaining a friendship requires work. I don't mean that as a bad thing. Good art requires work as well.
author: Charles de Lint

quote: Men and women can absolutely be friends, and that's what we need to be. Part of the problem is that we aren't friends enough. Our relationships are negotiations, and that is not friendship.
author: Hill Harper

quote: Since the Korean War, U.S. and South Korea have established an enduring friendship with shared interests, such as denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula, combating aggression abroad and developing our economies.
author: Charles B. Rangel

quote: Sweat makes good friendship cement.
author: Tyne Daly

quote: To me, Green Arrow in the past, what people loved about Oliver Queen pre-New 52 was his relationships with other heroes. Like his friendship with Green Lantern, his animosity with Hawkman, his romance with Black Canary - these are all the things that sort of defined him.
author: Jeff Lemire

quote: I feel friendship towards philosophers, but towards sophists, teachers of literature, or any other such kind of godforsaken people, I neither feel friendship now, nor may I ever do so in the future.
author: Apollonius of Tyana

quote: When you think back in history about producers and artists or writers who've had good synergy, a lot of times they date, or they're married, or there's a friendship and a kinship.
author: Solange Knowles

quote: We will seek friendship and goodwill with the nations of the world - but we do so with the understanding that it is the right of all nations to put their own interests first.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I have discovered that my interest in my dear pupil, Mabel, has ripened into a far deeper feeling than that of mere friendship. In fact, I know that I have learned to love her very sincerely.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: I think what 'The Hobbit' and Middle-earth deal in are quite universal and timeless themes of honour and love and friendship... so they're things that do resonate with people.
author: Martin Freeman

quote: Perfect friendship is the friendship of men who are good, and alike in excellence; for these wish well alike to each other qua good, and they are good in themselves.
author: Aristotle

quote: To want friendship is a great fault. Friendship ought to be a gratuitous joy, like the joys afforded by art or life.
author: Simone Weil

quote: It's the most exciting thing to watch God work when I've asked him about something, to listen to him and watch him work. It's like this friendship, and it just grows and grows and grows and grows.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: When the bank asks me about my assets, I include my friendship with Regis Philbin.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: Where is instruction in relationships, in the management of career, in the raising of children, in the pursuit of friendship, in the wise approach to anxiety and death? All this sort of stuff I craved to learn about when I was a student and down to this day.
author: Alain de Botton

quote: If you're going through friendship issues, I would say, first of all take a step back. How important is the friendship to you? Sometimes, if someone's not being a good friend to you and isn't treating you the way you should be treated, then you kind of have to move on sometimes.
author: Victoria Justice

quote: The little trouble in the world that is not due to love is due to friendship.
author: E. W. Howe

quote: Loyalty and friendship trumps politics for me.
author: Robert Kraft

quote: Ultimately, it's a sense of camaraderie and friendship with local people that is core to my journeys.
author: Tim Cope

quote: To like and dislike the same things, this is what makes a solid friendship.
author: Sallust

quote: I cherish the memory of being a friend of Frank Sinatra on a friendship level to the point where we really hung out. We worked in Vegas, we'd talk on the phone, and if I wasn't doing anything, I'd fly out, and I spent time in Palm Springs at his house - on a level the way friends would be, not with a whole crowd of people.
author: Frankie Valli

quote: So far as it depends on the course of this government, our relations of good will and friendship will be sedulously cultivated with all nations.
author: John Tyler

quote: And though my Lord hath lost his estate and been banished out of his country, yet neither despised poverty nor pinching necessity could make him break the bonds of friendship or weaken his loyal duty.
author: Margaret Cavendish

quote: In closing I wish to say that while I was sorely beset by a number of white riders in my racing days, I have also enjoyed the friendship of countless thousands of white men whom I class as among my closest friends.
author: Major Taylor

quote: To some it may be a thrill to be known, to me it's a thrill to start a friendship even up.
author: Christopher Knight

quote: I can tell you, dearest friend, that if it became known how much friendship, love and a world of human and spiritual references I have smuggled into these three movements, the adherents of programme music - should there be any left - would go mad with joy.
author: Alban Berg

quote: Never be afraid to meet to the hilt the demand of either work, or friendship - two of life's major assets.
author: Eleanor Robson Belmont

quote: Without wearing any mask we are conscious of, we have a special face for each friend.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: I have two or three guys that I'm really close to. We have a great friendship, and I think that helps our songwriting relationship. It's hard to start... with new people and cover the ground that I've covered with those guys.
author: Sam Hunt

quote: Sustaining true friendship is a lot more challenging than we give it credit for.
author: Mariella Frostrup

quote: I have enjoyed most particularly reading the correspondence between Gustav Mahler and Richard Strauss. The genuine friendship, competitiveness and support that thread through their communications are life lessons for us all.
author: Jessye Norman

quote: Aristotle uses a mother's love for her child as the prime example of love or friendship.
author: Mortimer Adler

quote: I'm single, footloose and fancy free, I have no responsibilities, no anchors. Work, friendship and self-improvement, that's me.
author: Joel Edgerton

quote: I keep my friends as misers do their treasure, because, of all the things granted us by wisdom, none is greater or better than friendship.
author: Pietro Aretino

quote: I've learned from my dealings with Johnny Carson that no matter what kind of friendship you think you have with people you're working with, when the chips are down, it's all about business.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: An insincere and evil friend is more to be feared than a wild beast; a wild beast may wound your body, but an evil friend will wound your mind.
author: Unknown

quote: Friendship is a wildly underrated medication.
author: Anna Deavere Smith

quote: There is no friendship in trade.
author: Cornelius Vanderbilt

quote: Love demands infinitely less than friendship.
author: George Jean Nathan

quote: Came but for friendship, and took away love.
author: Thomas Moore

quote: Suspicion is the cancer of friendship.
author: Petrarch

quote: We became friends as we became a band. Our friendship evolved as the band evolved. It had its ups and downs, but it was mostly ups for the four of us. We got along well almost all of the time. Hey! We liked each other and we still do.
author: Dave Blood

quote: All love that has not friendship for its base, is like a mansion built upon the sand.
author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quote: I've always wanted to be a mom because I want to give a kid all of the magical gifts my mom gave to me, such as love and friendship. She and I had this incredible connection that was so unbelievable.
author: Jennifer Love Hewitt

quote: Loyalty and friendship, which is to me the same, created all the wealth that I've ever thought I'd have.
author: Ernie Banks

quote: Men kick friendship around like a football, but it doesn't seem to crack. Women treat it like glass and it goes to pieces.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: He has no enemies, but is intensely disliked by his friends.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Friendship, of itself a holy tie, is made more sacred by adversity.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: Show me a genuine case of platonic friendship, and I shall show you two old or homely faces.
author: Austin O'Malley

quote: China has been committed to the independent foreign policy of peace and has developed friendship and cooperation with all countries on the basis of the Five Principles of Peaceful Coexistence.
author: Hu Jintao

quote: I've got some great guy friends. They can start out as crushes. But when you realize something isn't going to happen, you make a choice whether or not the friendship is worth it. And it usually is. Then you can laugh about the fact that you used to have a crush on him or he had one on you.
author: Courteney Cox

quote: Friendships are the family we make - not the one we inherit. I've always been someone to whom friendship, elective affinities, is as important as family.
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: Any friendship or relationship is about a language.
author: Gina Bellman

quote: Much of my work over the years has developed the premise that women's styles of friendship and conversation aren't inherently better than men's, simply different.
author: Deborah Tannen

quote: The part which American friendship played in helping us to win the freedom we enjoy in this part of Ireland has been gratefully recognized and acknowledged by our people.
author: Eamon de Valera

quote: As is natural with contiguous states having like institutions and like aims of advancement and development, the friendship of the United States and Mexico has been constantly maintained.
author: Chester A. Arthur

quote: When two people first meet, they can only have a very ordinary kind of friendship. But when you begin to understand each other, when you get close to them, you discover that you're suddenly eager to know him or her even better.
author: Zhang Ziyi

quote: My aim is to create a happy society with genuine friendship. Friendship between Tibetan and Chinese peoples is very essential.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Our friends interpret the world and ourselves to us, if we take them tenderly and truly.
author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quote: Many a friendship, long, loyal, and self-sacrificing, rested at first on no thicker a foundation than a kind word.
author: Frederick William Faber

quote: One's friends are that part of the human race with which one can be human.
author: George Santayana

quote: Silences make the real conversations between friends. Not the saying but the never needing to say is what counts.
author: Margaret Lee Runbeck

quote: It is important to our friends to believe that we are unreservedly frank with them, and important to friendship that we are not.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: You win the victory when you yield to friends.
author: Sophocles

quote: The most deadly fruit is borne by the hatred which one grafts on an extinguished friendship.
author: Gotthold Ephraim Lessing

quote: Friendship's the wine of life: but friendship new... is neither strong nor pure.
author: Edward Young

quote: What I cannot love, I overlook. Is that real friendship?
author: Anais Nin

quote: Friendship is an arrangement by which we undertake to exchange small favors for big ones.
author: Charles de Montesquieu

quote: To cement a new friendship, especially between foreigners or persons of a different social world, a spark with which both were secretly charged must fly from person to person, and cut across the accidents of place and time.
author: Cornelia Otis Skinner

quote: Conjugal love, or the friendship of spouses, can persist even after sexual desires have weakened, withered, and disappeared.
author: Mortimer Adler

quote: Although the troops have struck us, we throw it all behind and are glad to meet you in peace and friendship.
author: Black Kettle

quote: Working with people, the musical part is one thing but the personal part is totally different and just as critical. If the friendship is there and it's a lasting friendship, then it will take care of itself.
author: John Mayall

quote: Caring for but never trying to own may be a further way to define friendship.
author: William Glasser

quote: Time makes friendship stronger, but love weaker.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: There are no rules for friendship. It must be left to itself. We cannot force it any more than love.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: Friendship without self-interest is one of the rare and beautiful things of life.
author: James F. Byrnes

quote: The friendship we share grows amidst the craggy rock pond reeds of water spray fireflies scented with bonfires.
author: Bradley Chicho

quote: Plunderous is the palate I gift to you, openly I hug the universe of our friendship expanding its outer limit.
author: Bradley Chicho

quote: The friendship of Shostakovich cast a brilliant light over my whole life and whose spiritual qualities captured my soul once and for all time.
author: Galina Vishnevskaya

quote: I came to Venice for the first time in 1968 and was lucky enough to make the acquaintanceship, and then the friendship, of two Venetians, Roberta and Franco, who remain my best friends here after almost 50 years.
author: Donna Leon

quote: Primarily, 'Black Girl/White Girl' is the story of two very different, yet somehow 'fated' girls; for Genna, her 'friendship' with Minette is the most haunting of her life, though it is one-sided and ends in tragedy.
author: Joyce Carol Oates

quote: My writing partner, Nicki, and I became obsessed with a monologist who performs unscripted shows equipped with nothing more than scribbled bullet points and a glass of water. We wrote him a fan letter and found ourselves sharing lunch and eventually a friendship.
author: Emma McLaughlin

quote: I made my first white women friends in college; they loved me and were loyal to our friendship, but I understood, as they did, that they were white women and that whiteness mattered.
author: Alice Walker

quote: Stop using the word 'bromance.' Can we please kill that stupid term? We're just friends. It's called friendship!
author: Blake Shelton

quote: The only things that are really permanent are love, family, friendship, and that is a lesson. At the end of the day, that's really what it boils down to. The rest of it is just stuff.
author: Jared Kushner

quote: I am deeply spiritual; I revel in those things that make for good - the things that we can do to shed a little light, to help place an oft-dissonant universe back in tune with itself... Long live art, long live friendship, long live the joy of life!
author: Jessye Norman

quote: Never was a man further from a partiality for Spain than I am. But I think I now have left them in a sincere and steady intention to cultivate the friendship of America.
author: Marquis de Lafayette

quote: Let me be very clear: my friendship with my friends ends where the interest of the country begins.
author: Rodrigo Duterte

quote: Read as you taste fruit or savor wine, or enjoy friendship, love or life.
author: George Herbert

quote: They took their meals together; and it was remarked on such occasions, when the friendship of animals is put to a hard test, that they never quarrelled or disputed the possession of a favourite fruit with each other.
author: Henry Walter Bates

quote: We come into relationships often very much identified with our needs. I need this, I need security, I need refuge, I need friendship. And all of relationships are symbiotic in that sense. We come together because we fulfill each others' needs at some level or other.
author: Ram Dass

quote: The rules of friendship are tacit, unconscious; they are not rational. In business, though, you have to think rationally.
author: Steven Pinker

quote: It is impossible to preserve my friendship with people who are allegedly leaders when they are attacking their own people, shooting at them, using tanks and other forms of heavy weaponry.
author: Recep Tayyip Erdogan

quote: I hope to continue my friendship with France and its filmmakers for many years to come.
author: Harvey Weinstein

quote: I've got many close friends, but there's an awful lot about friendship that is not demonstrative in my case.
author: Warren Christopher

quote: The most important thing for me is to have real friendship between Egyptians and Americans.
author: Mohammed Morsi

quote: From the Twitter responses we got with 'Best Friends Forever' and the small feedback we are getting as the show is meted out, I think people are seeing themselves in the show and enjoying seeing female friendship portrayed in the way it really is.
author: Lennon Parham

quote: Our friendship was based on my payouts. That wasn't a friendship when - as, for example, it's me, my friends, we are friends for many years, and it doesn't matter for me what the position is, where they work; we simply are friends. And with Mr. Berezovsky, our friendship was based on my payoffs.
author: Roman Abramovich

quote: Rejoicing in our joy, not suffering over our suffering, makes someone a friend.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Peace, commerce and honest friendship with all nations; entangling alliances with none.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: If we are to judge of love by its consequences, it more nearly resembles hatred than friendship.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: One of the most mawkish of human delusions is the notion that friendship should be eternal, or, at all events, life-long, and that any act which puts a term to it is somehow discreditable.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: I mix talents and friendship, which is not very professional, but it's my way of thinking. So I love Azzedine Alaia, because I've known him for 30 years, and he's making my dresses most of the time.
author: Carine Roitfeld

quote: I think people just like seeing friendship. I think people like seeing people who just drive each other up the wall, but at same time, can't live without each other.
author: Martin Freeman

quote: What I particularly like about Broadway is the camaraderie and the friendship of other people in other shows. Everybody knows you're opening and cares about you. There's a real village atmosphere.
author: Ian Mckellen

quote: You've got to reach a hand of friendship across the aisle and across philosophies in this country.
author: Joe Biden

quote: Friendship increases in visiting friends, but in visiting them seldom.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: I'm quite obsessed with the idea of nailing the girl friendship. It's such an art, so delicate.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: I've learned that friendship does not equate business, business does not equate friendship.
author: Jill Scott

quote: The solution as consumers is - perhaps surprisingly - to take adverts very, very seriously. We should ask ourselves what it is that we find lovely in them - the visions of friendship, togetherness, repose, or whatever. And then consider what would actually help us find these qualities in our lives.
author: Alain de Botton

quote: The arrogance that says analysing the relationship between reasons and causes is more important than writing a philosophy of shyness or sadness or friendship drives me nuts. I can't accept that.
author: Alain de Botton

quote: Allowing a friend to careen toward self destruction is not friendship. That is a habit the United States needs to break as it pursues a richer and more deeply supportive relationship with Israel.
author: Stephen Kinzer

quote: When David Fincher called me up a few years ago and said, 'Hey, I'd like you to score this film 'The Social Network,' I said, 'I'm flattered, but I really don't have any real experience scoring films, and I'd rather not screw it up on a high-profile project. And I like you and I don't want to compromise our friendship.'
author: Trent Reznor

quote: There is a lot that binds Germany to Turkey, and even if we have a difference of opinion on an individual matter, the breadth of our links, our friendship, our strategic ties, is great.
author: Angela Merkel

quote: My mom and I always had a great bond. It was always a natural friendship bond since early on. My mom was 18 when she had me.
author: Christina Milian

quote: I really think that technology has the greatest potential to accelerate happiness of most things in the world. The companies that will ultimately do well are the companies that chase happiness. If you find a way to help people find love, or health or friendship, the dollar will chase that.
author: Ashton Kutcher

quote: Around the time I graduated from high school, I decided better to underachieve and have friendship than to overachieve and be alone.
author: Evangeline Lilly

quote: Today, I, too, wish to reaffirm that I intend to continue on the path toward improved relations and friendship with the Jewish people, following the decisive lead given by John Paul II.
author: Pope Benedict XVI

quote: Friendship is one of the most tangible things in a world which offers fewer and fewer supports.
author: Kenneth Branagh

quote: I want to use my connections with coaches, players, celebrities, whomever, and if I can take that friendship and use it to help someone else, I'm going to take advantage of that. I'm not going to apologize for that.
author: Tim Tebow

quote: Friendship is almost always the union of a part of one mind with the part of another people are friends in spots.
author: George Santayana

quote: Laughter is not a bad beginning for a friendship, and it is the best ending for one.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: It is one of the severest tests of friendship to tell your friend his faults. So to love a man that you cannot bear to see a stain upon him, and to speak painful truth through loving words, that is friendship.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: I only understand friendship or scorched earth.
author: Roger Ailes

quote: It may happen sometimes that a long debate becomes the cause of a longer friendship. Commonly, those who dispute with one another at last agree.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Friendship, like credit, is highest when it is not used.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: There is a scarcity of friendship, but not of friends.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: The first two lessons, which we learned early in our efforts to be good member missionaries, have made sharing the Gospel much easier: We simply can't predict who will or won't be interested in the Gospel, and building a friendship is not a prerequisite to inviting people to learn about the Gospel.
author: Clayton Christensen

quote: Seth Green, he and I are trying to figure out how this all came about. Because we don't remember what came first, the chicken or the egg, no pun intended. But I don't remember what came first, 'Robot Chicken' or our friendship, because we've known each other for so long.
author: Katee Sackhoff

quote: I lend people money, but I'd never lend something that would jeopardise a friendship if I didn't get it back.
author: Paloma Faith

quote: Before the flowers of friendship faded friendship faded.
author: Gertrude Stein

quote: I don't think men are that attracted by glamour. I think women are attracted by glamour. I think men are attracted by a sense of friendship.
author: Joanna Lumley

quote: Rock n' roll as a genre is different from pop and hip hop: it is about bands, and that for me suggests brotherhood, family, friendship and community.
author: Steven Van Zandt

quote: It is mind-boggling to me that there are so few movies about female friendship, considering women make up half the movie-going population.
author: Ari Graynor

quote: The key to doing 'Harold and Kumar' movies is you make it earnest. Primarily what we do is make Harold and Kumar's relationship and friendship believable, and we don't actually work on being that funny.
author: John Cho

quote: I love all girl squads. I'm all for, like, girl power and friendship, and I'm all about that.
author: Poppy Delevingne

quote: In romance, we feel the need to zoom in and expound on our partner's foibles in intimate detail; in friendship, we tend to do the opposite, avoiding confrontation through fear, lethargy or both.
author: Mariella Frostrup

quote: You can't build anything with a flimsy foundation. Friendship is the foundation.
author: Hill Harper

quote: Whenever people reach out the hand of friendship towards me, I am not going to refuse that hand.
author: Martin McGuinness

quote: A lot of women, when they're young, feel they have very good friends, and find later on that friendship is complicated. It's easy to be friends when everyone's 18.
author: Zadie Smith

quote: I firmly believe, only because I've been doing this for so long, every show takes three years. 90% of them don't get three years. It just does. It takes a long time to build a community, build a friendship with your characters. It's hard for people to grasp on and make them care about you.
author: Kaley Cuoco

quote: In 1962, I wrote a series about 42nd Street called 'Welcome to Lostville.' One result was that the young Bob Dylan read it and invited me to his first concert at Town Hall; the result was a kind of friendship that years later led to my liner notes for 'Blood on the Tracks.'
author: Pete Hamill

quote: 006 was such an interesting character and the film really explored his friendship with Bond and how it all went wrong, so it was a very personal journey for both characters.
author: Sean Bean

quote: A friendship between Germany and Israel didn't always seem natural.
author: Reuven Rivlin

quote: Two of man's basic needs are to love and to share. Both of these needs are satisfied in greater or lesser degree by friendship.
author: Mother Angelica

quote: When our weaknesses affect health and friendship, we are very much aware of their existence.
author: Mother Angelica

quote: I find that the Amazon comments often are exceptionally shrewd and insightful, so I'm not going to diss them. But you don't really have any guarantees that what you're reading wasn't written out of friendship or spite.
author: Michael Dirda

quote: When the Taiwan Relations Act passed in 1979, our biggest concern was preventing the use of military force against Taiwan. Little did we know that our friends on Taiwan could so effectively use the space created by our friendship to revolutionize their political system.
author: Sam Brownback

quote: Obviously, when you're up against somebody you don't like there's extra motivation, but I don't think any person going for an Olympic gold is going to put friendship first.
author: Katarina Johnson-Thompson

quote: My definition of a friend is somebody who adores you even though they know the things you're most ashamed of.
author: Jodie Foster

quote: Advocating for yourself in the context of friendship starts with choosing the right people to be part of your inner circle.
author: Kimberly Guilfoyle

quote: There is a mutual interest between Israel and the United States of America. It is more than friendship - it is friendship plus mutual interest, and it is bipartisan.
author: Tzipi Livni

quote: My message to the people and rulers of Pakistan is, 'As neighbours, we want peace and friendship and cooperation with you so that together we can change the face of South Asia.'
author: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

quote: I came to know Gore Vidal in the mid-1980s, when I was living in southern Italy, virtually a neighbour, and our friendship lasted until his death in 2012. Needless to say, he was a complicated and often combative man.
author: Jay Parini

quote: There was a time when I thought dudes had friendship all figured out. The focus on eating things in front of giant screens, pretending to punch one another, competing over who can utter the grossest and most profane personal insults imaginable - this struck me as the very apex of human social exchange.
author: Lynn Coady

quote: Friendship is something that is cultivated.
author: Thalia

quote: It's always really challenging trying to go from player to player/coach. You have a kind of friendship basis of relationship with all of your teammates, and now you go to this power position where you have to make decisions that might hurt people's feelings.
author: Abby Wambach

quote: Look, I worked with American Republican presidents and Democratic presidents, all of them, and each of them has shown a deep and profound friendship to Israel, you know? I can't remember anybody who was in that sense negative as far as Israel is concerned.
author: Shimon Peres

quote: Friendship formed in the glamour industry comes with mutual benefits, which is nice, but it is not the real deal.
author: Mohit Chauhan

quote: I think for a lot of people, friendship is a relationship that gets devalued once they move on to what people consider to be more important relationships: once you find a partner or when you have kids.
author: Hanya Yanagihara

quote: In a basic sense, 'A Little Life' is a homage to how my friends and I live our lives. I wanted to push past the definitions of how we typically define friendship. It's a different version of adulthood, but it's no less important and no less legitimate than anyone else's.
author: Hanya Yanagihara

quote: Friendship is one of our most treasured relationships, but it isn't codified and celebrated; it's never going to give you a party.
author: Hanya Yanagihara

quote: Sweet is the scene where genial friendship plays the pleasing game of interchanging praise.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: Maybe having to pretend to be in love with someone and then jump into bed with them breaks the ice very quickly friendship follows fast.
author: Katherine Kelly

quote: No doubt, the most important thing in my career was my time with Mr. Bergman, with whom I worked in so many films and also in so many stage productions, so it was a continuous working relationship and also a friendship, of course, that lasted for so many years.
author: Max von Sydow

quote: There are a lot of musicians I've met on Twitter where it was like, 'Hey, I like your music' - and then I ended up meeting them and it turned into a friendship.
author: Grimes

quote: Life is all about the friendship and the love and the music. It sounds silly, but it is. I want to have that experience as much as I can as an adult, not as a kid doing something that people are telling her she has to do. If anyone gets in my way, I'm going to get them out of my way.
author: Fiona Apple

quote: Value your friendship. Value your relationships.
author: Barbara Bush

quote: Friendship and sentiment and the giving of one's words are very important.
author: Michael Cimino

quote: I think friendship is more important than love, but that love that grows out of friendship is the very best of all.
author: Jane Green

quote: Going through an illness and then death of a close friend has changed my attitudes to friendship enormously.
author: Jane Green

quote: I experience for the American officers and soldiers that friendship which arises from having shared with them for a length of time dangers, sufferings, and both good and evil fortune.
author: Marquis de Lafayette
